Articles.Title: Starmer says Tesla investment welcome after Musk row
Articles.Summary: Sir Keir Starmer says Tesla investment welcome after Musk row. Musk not invited to UK's International Investment Summit due to social media posts during last month's riots.

Articles.Title: Can Tesla's EVs win over India's price-conscious buyers?
Articles.Summary: Tesla has begun hiring for a dozen jobs in Delhi and Mumbai. It is also reportedly hunting for showrooms in both cities. Tata Motors currently holds pole position in India's EV market - with over 60% market share.

Articles.Title: Elon Musk's Tesla lobbied UK to charge petrol drivers more
Articles.Summary: Elon Musk has waded into British politics openly on social media. But behind the scenes his firm was trying to persuade the new government to extend a policy that would boost his firm's profits. The company called for the mandate to boost electric car sales to be extended to lorries.

Articles.Title: Uber strikes EV deal with Chinese Tesla rival BYD
Articles.Summary: Uber will offer drivers incentives to switch to electric cars. Deal will be rolled out first in Europe and Latin America. It will then be made available in the Middle East, Canada, Australia and New Zealand.

Articles.Title: Tesla surprises with better than expected car sales
Articles.Summary: Elon Musk's electric car-maker delivered nearly 444,000 vehicles in the three months ended 30 June. That was far more than most analysts had expected - though still down nearly 5% from the same period in 2023. Tesla has slashed prices repeatedly to try to win back shoppers.

Articles.Title: US launches probe of Tesla's 'smart summon' driverless tech
Articles.Summary: US safety regulators have opened an investigation of a Tesla feature that allows drivers to summon parked cars without being in the vehicle. At least four crashes had been reported involving the Actually Smart Summon technology. The feature is in place on nearly 2.6 million cars made by Tesla since 2016.

Articles.Title: Tesla shares slump after European sales fall
Articles.Summary: Tesla shares slump after European sales fall. Shares in electric car maker Tesla have slumped more than 9%. EU and UK sales fell by almost half in January. Drop in Tesla shares took the company's valuation back below $1trn.

Articles.Title: Trump says anti-Tesla protesters will face 'hell'
Articles.Summary: Trump says anti-Tesla protesters will face 'hell' at White House event. Demonstrators have targeted Tesla showrooms in recent weeks in protest against Musk's cost-cutting role in Trump's administration.

Articles.Title: Driver stopped in Tesla Cybertruck banned in UK
Articles.Summary: Driver stopped in Tesla Cybertruck banned in UK. Tesla recalled thousands of its new Cybertrucks in April 2024. Officers spotted the eye-catching vehicle in Whitefield, Bury, on Thursday.

Articles.Title: Vehicles damaged at Belfast Tesla dealership
Articles.Summary: 20 vehicles damaged at a Tesla dealership on Boucher Road in Belfast. Police received a report of damage to vehicles on a commercial premises on Sunday. Most of the vehicles "have had their wing mirrors knocked off, while others have also had windows smashed"

Comparisons.Comparison: Starmer says Tesla investment welcome after Musk row vs. Can Tesla's EVs win over India's price-conscious buyers?
Comparisons.Impact: Article 1 sentiment: NEGATIVE, Article 2 sentiment: POSITIVE
